title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - NFL Next Gen Stats: Decoding Defensive Coverage Using Transformer Architectures
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - NFL Next Gen Stats：使用Transformer架构解码防守覆盖
abstract: The NFL and AWS have developed new Next Gen Stats that leverage advanced Machine Learning models to analyze defensive coverages in NFL football games. Using spatio-temporal transformer architectures with factorized attention mechanisms, the system produces three key metrics: individual coverage assignments, receiver-defender matchups, and target defender identification on pass plays. This multi-faceted approach enables comprehensive analysis of defensive strategies, from pre-snap alignments to evolving coverage responsibilities as plays unfold. By automating the complex task of coverage analysis through advanced AI modeling, these new statistics provide unprecedented insights into defensive tactics, player performance evaluation, and offensive decision-making. The technology enhances both real-time broadcast commentary and in-depth strategic analysis for teams and analysts.
abstract_cn: NFL和AWS开发了新的Next Gen Stats，利用先进的机器学习模型分析NFL橄榄球比赛中的防守覆盖。该系统使用具有因式分解注意力机制的时空变换器架构，产生三个关键指标：个人覆盖分配、接球员-防守员对位以及传球时的目标防守员识别。这种多方面的方法能够全面分析防守策略，从开球前的阵型到比赛展开过程中不断变化的覆盖责任。通过先进的AI建模自动化复杂的覆盖分析任务，这些新统计数据为防守战术、球员表现评估和进攻决策提供了前所未有的洞察。该技术增强了实时广播解说和团队及分析师的深度战略分析。
